reviews.text: It's a restaurant review as Trip Advisor hasn't added the We had lunch with friends upstairs, the decor and set out is great but there are two issues we had which left a bad taste..
reviews.title: Could Not Care

reviews.text: Firstly, it has an atrium in the middle so there are smokers sitting next to you whilst having lunch. Either have it as somewhere to eat or somewhere to smoke, not both.
reviews.title: Nice venue, crap service

reviews.text: Secondly, the staff could not care less. I stood at the bar with two others whilst we waited for one of the staff (who was standing in front of us) tell a story to another staff memebr. When she finished, then looked up and said "who's next". A very arragant attitude.
reviews.title: Lunch at Hotel
